channel.title: CVE Feed for Tomita Masahiro -- ruby-mysql
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tomita Masahiro -- ruby-mysql

item.title: CVE-2021-3779|2024-08-03T17:09:08.660Z -- tomita%20masahiro -- ruby-mysql
item.description: A malicious MySQL server can request local file content from a client using ruby-mysql prior to version 2.10.0 without explicit authorization from the user. This issue was resolved in version 2.10.0 and later.
